group.name: Key Type argument constraints - Bean Validation Properties
Type argument constraints - Bean Validation Properties

attribute.name: author
attribute.description: Describes an author.

attribute.name: includeInUI
attribute.description: If unselected, attribute will not be available in frontend.

attribute.name: propertyChangeSupport
attribute.description: Property Change Support

attribute.name: vetoableChangeSupport
attribute.description: Vetoable Change Support

attribute.name: entityName
attribute.description: Entity name will be used to identify the domain for JPQL queries ( default value is the entity class name )

attribute.name: abstract
attribute.description: Abstract entities cannot be instantiated but it can be queried just like concrete entities. If an abstract entity is the target of a query, the query operates on all the concrete subclasses of the abstract entity.

attribute.name: orphanRemoval
attribute.description: The orphanRemoval functionality is intended for entities that are privately "owned" by their parent entity and defines whether removing the relationship should also result in a removal of the referred entity.

attribute.name: orphanRemoval
attribute.description: The orphanRemoval functionality is intended for entities that are privately "owned" by their parent entity and defines whether removing the relationship should also result in a removal of the referred entity.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must not be null.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be null.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be false.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be true.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be a date in the past.

attribute.name: orPresent
attribute.description: The notion of present here is defined relatively to the type on which the constraint is used. For instance, if the constraint is on a Year, present would mean the whole current year.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be a date in the future.

attribute.name: orPresent
attribute.description: The notion of present here is defined relatively to the type on which the constraint is used. For instance, if the constraint is on a Year, present would mean the whole current year.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The size of the field or property is evaluated and must match the specified boundaries.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must match the regular expression defined in the regexp element.

attribute.name: regexp
attribute.description: The regular expression to match

attribute.name: flags
attribute.description: Flags considered when resolving the regular expression. [ UNIX_LINES, CASE_INSENSITIVE, COMMENTS, MULTILINE, DOTALL, UNICODE_CASE, CANON_EQ ] *** e.g : CASE_INSENSITIVE, MULTILINE (comma-separated value)

attribute.name: message
attribute.description: The error message template

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be a number within a specified range. The integer element specifies the maximum integral digits for the number, and the fraction element specifies the maximum fractional digits for the number.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be an integer value greater than or equal to the number in the value element.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be an integer value lower than or equal to the number in the value element.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be an integer value greater than or equal to the number in the value element.

attribute.name: inclusive
attribute.description: Specifies whether the specified minimum is inclusive or exclusive. By default, it is inclusive.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be a decimal value lower than or equal to the number in the value element.

attribute.name: inclusive
attribute.description: Specifies whether the specified maximum is inclusive or exclusive. By default, it is inclusive.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must not be null.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be null.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be false.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be true.

attribute.name: selected
attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be a date in the past.

attribute.name: orPresent
attribute.description: The notion of present here is defined relatively to the type on which the constraint is used. For instance, if the constraint is on a Year, present would mean the whole current year.

attribute.description: The value of the field or property must be a date in the future.

attribute.description: The size of the field or property is evaluated and must match the specified boundaries.

attribute.description: The value of the field or property must match the regular expression defined in the regexp element.
